name: wordpressthemes
short_description: The SourceForge WordPress Themes Collection is a handpicked selection of free and popular WordPress backdrops, which are customizable with a CSS theme editor.  At SourceForge we work hard to make sure that you get the best search experience. It’s our job to make it easy for you to find great Open Source software and we take that pledge seriously. That's why we plan to expand and update the SouceForge WordPress Themes Collection over time. We also look forward to your feedback. It is our sincere desire to continually improve the SourceForge experience for WordPress bloggers.
summary: A collection of free and popular WordPress themes
